title: (x) Rounded "P" condensed serif font - Bernard MT Condensed {Nick Cooke}
content:
Can anybody help me identify this font?

Thanks

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [p.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210163216/http:/typophile.com/files/p.jpg) | 91.07 KB |

 [‹ Lovely Ligatures](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210163216/http:/typophile.com/node/38620 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Unicase face in newspaper ad for Gallo wines - FF Disturbance {Forrest} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210163216/http:/typophile.com/node/38618 "Go to next forum topic")
author: zeckdude

comments.content:
A little bit like a cleaned-up version of [Bernhard Bold Condensed](http://web.archive.org/web/20081210163216/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/bernhard-bold-condensed/familytree.html) …  
Do you have more letters to show?

I swear I’ve seen a cut of Bernhard Bold Condensed that had been cleaned up like this. I forget whose it was.

- Lex

Bernard MT Condensed is the cleaned-up version. It’s in my FontBook - I don’t know where it came from, maybe Adobe CS?

Nick Cooke

Bernard MT Gothic © 1990 Adobe, © 1991 Monotype.

. . .  
Bert Vanderveen BNO
